lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Duke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 11, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project first)
1. Open the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`.
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.
1. Configure the project to use **JDK 11** (not other versions) as explained in [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/sdk.html#set-up-jdk).
In the same dialog, set the **Project language level** field to the `SDK default` option.

3. After that, locate the `src/main/java/duke.Duke.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run duke.Duke.main()` (if the code editor is showing compile errors, try restarting the IDE). If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below as the output:

<Rectangle fx:id="container" arcHeight="20.0" arcWidth="20.0" fill="#3f3f3f" height="120.0" layoutY="2.0" opacity="0.84" stroke="TRANSPARENT" strokeType="INSIDE" width="363.0" />
<Label fx:id="dialog" alignment="TOP_LEFT" layoutX="8.0" layoutY="8.0" maxHeight="1.7976931348623157E308" maxWidth="280.0" minHeight="120.0" text="Label" textFill="WHITE" wrapText="true">
<ImageView fx:id="displayPicture" fitHeight="99.0" fitWidth="99.0" layoutX="8.0" layoutY="15.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true" />

<AnchorPane maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="502.0" style="-fx-background-color: #111111; -fx-border-color: #111111;" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/16" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="duke.ui.MainWindow">

<Button fx:id="sendButton" layoutX="416.0" layoutY="554.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="71.0" style="-fx-font-size: 16; -fx-font-family: "Helvetica"; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="SEND" />
<ScrollPane fx:id="scrollPane" hbarPolicy="NEVER" hvalue="1.0" prefHeight="549.0" prefWidth="502.0" style="-fx-background-color: #111111; fx-border-color: #222222;" styleClass="corn" vvalue="1.0">

<TextField fx:id="userInput" layoutX="3.0" layoutY="555.6666666666666" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="408.0" style="-fx-background-color: #888888;" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="4.0" />
